items.sentence: During the performance, I was so nervous that my legs were shaking.
You should be able to do that as well as Tom in two or three years.
You didn't know I was the one who was supposed to do that, did you?
You could've called and let me know that you were going to be late.
The house is very old. It needs to be renovated before you sell it.

Tom has been sitting under that tree all afternoon, reading a book.
They say that instinct makes you crave foods that are good for you.
Tom didn't sell his cello, even though he desperately needed money.
My gut-feeling is that Tom isn't the one responsible for this mess.
